name: 比翼資本 BE CAPITAL
des: BE Capital is a healthcare focused investment firm formed making investments into promising private and public hospital and healthcare technology ventures in the Greater China and U.S.

name: IAPS
des: IAPS is a university-owned accelerator, focusing on building comprehensive startup ecosystem, IAPS links startups, corporates, mentors and overseas partners with accelerating service.

name: SparkLabs
des: SparkLabs is a startup accelerator of specializing in internet, online gaming, mobile, ecommerce, artificial intelligence, virtual reality, digital media, gaming, financial tech, and healthcare sectors.

name: Mobile Only X
des: MOX — the Mobile Only Accelerator — helps the best mobile startups from around the world acquire millions of users in Southeast Asia, India, Eastern Europe and South America.

name: Tech Stars
des: Techstars helps entrepreneurs succeed. Through the Techstars Worldwide Entrepreneur Network, founders and their teams connect with other entrepreneurs, experts, mentors, alumni, investors, community leaders, and corporate partners who will help their companies grow.

name: 10X Labs
des: 10X Labs is an action-oriented think tank, based in Sweden. They are committed to finding answers to the questions and opportunities that arise from exponential technological change.

name: Garage Plus
des: Founded by Epoch Foundation, a renowned non- profit organization based in Taipei, Taiwan, Garage+ doesn’t just provide a space for incubation but also fosters a thriving startup ecosystem supported by experienced and successful entrepreneurs.

name: SKYDECK
des: Formed as a partnership between the Haas School of Business, the College of Engineering, and the Office of the Vice Chancellor for Research, SkyDeck combines the consulting know-how of traditional accelerators with the vast resources of its research university.

name: Startup Bootcamp
des: We support early-stage tech founders to rapidly scale their companies by providing direct access to an international network of the most relevant mentors, partners, and investors in their industry.

name: Star Fab
des: StarFab was founded in 2016 with the realization that a startup requires more than just an innovative product and funding to successfully establish its position in today’s competitive and fast-paced market.

name: TVC
des: TVC is dedicated to commercializing new technologies and inventions from discoveries made and developed at the University of Utah.

name: 104人力銀行
des: TVC is dedicated to commercializing new technologies and inventions from discoveries made and developed at the University of Utah.

name: acer 宏碁
des: Acer Incorporated is Taiwan's leading exporter and the world's fifth largest computer manufacturer.

name: Audi
des: Audi AG is a German automobile manufacturer that designs, engineers, produces, markets and distributes luxury vehicles.

name: AMAZON
des: Amazon Web Services is a subsidiary of Amazon.com that provides on-demand cloud computing platforms to individuals, companies and governments, on a paid subscription basis.

name: 中華電信
des: Chunghwa Telecom is the largest telecommunications company in Taiwan and the incumbent mobile, PSTN and broadband carrier there.

name: Compal
des: Compal Electronics is a Taiwanese original design manufacturer, handling the production of notebook computers, monitors and televisions for a variety of clients around the world, including Apple Inc., Acer, Lenovo, Dell, Toshiba, Hewlett-Packard and Fujitsu.

name: CTBC中國信託
des: Formerly known as China Securities Investment Corp., CTBC Bank Co. Ltd. was established in 1966 and has been affiliated with CTBC Financial Holding Co., Ltd. since May 17, 2002.

name: 星展銀行
des: DBS Group Holdings Ltd is one of the largest financial services groups in Asia. Listed and headquartered in Singapore, DBS has operations in 18 markets with a network comprising more than 280 branches / outlets.

name: Google
des: Google is an American multinational technology company that specializes in Internet-related services and products, which include online advertising technologies, search engine, cloud computing, software, and hardware.

name: Lite On
des: Lite-On is a computer storage devices company of individual companies that primarily manufacture consumer electronics, including LEDs, semiconductors, computer chassis, monitors, motherboards, DVD, and CD devices, and other electronic components.

name: Lumo Labs
des: LUMO Labs is a two-year venture builder program that besides providing preseed and seed funding, actively supports entrepreneurs with a ''hands on'' approach.

name: Microsoft
des: Microsoft Corporation is an American multinational technology company with headquarters in Redmond, Washington.

name: Nvidia
des: Nvidia Corporation is an American technology company incorporated in Delaware and based in Santa Clara, California.

name: Ocford Instruments
des: Oxford Instruments plc is a leading provider of high technology products, systems and tools to the world's leading industrial companies and scientific research communities.

name: 趨勢科技
des: Trend Micro Inc. is a Japanese multinational cyber security and defense company founded in Los Angeles, California with global headquarters in Tokyo, Japan, a R&D center in Taipei, Taiwan, and regional headquarters in Asia, Europe and the Americas.

name: Wistron
des: Winstron is one of the world’s largest suppliers of information and communications products. The company has several global logistical and distribution operational bases in Asia, Europe, and North America.

name: WPG Holdings
des: WPG Holdings operating through four leading semiconductor components distributors (WPIg, SACg, AITg, and YOSUNg) serves as a franchise partner for nearly 250 world-wide suppliers.

name: Futureward
des: FutureWard's mission is to build a collaborative innovation ecosystem with shared access to well-equipped makerspaces, scalable private & open-plan coworking offices, and dedicated event spaces.

name: The Hoffman Agency
des: The Hoffman Agency is a global public relations firm. It employs more than 150 people across nine offices in Europe, Asia Pacific and the United States. The company's customers range from Google to Axis Communications to the City of Fremont.

name: 博沛科技
des: Creators of the ”Pepper“ robot. Developed by Japanese telecom giant, SoftBank Corp.

name: Umbo Computer Vision
des: Umbo Computer Vision is an artificial intelligence company building autonomous video security systems for businesses and organizations. Our newest product, Umbo Light, recently won the SIA New Product Showcase award in the Video Analytics category at ISC West 2017.

name: Bureau Francais De Taipei
des: The French Office in Taipei represents France interests in Taiwan in the absence of formal diplomatic relations, functioning as a de facto embassy. Its counterpart in France is the Taipei Representative Office in France, based in Paris.

name: French Tech
des: ”La French Tech“ is one of the main support mechanisms and tools used by France to promote the development of emerging technologies. It is based on the concept of linking public and private, domestic and overseas stakeholders, to create a comprehensive network.

name: NTIO (Holland)
des: The Netherlands Trade and Investment office is the formal representation of the government of The Netherlands in Taiwan.

name: CDIB
des: CDIB Capital International invests in high growth companies seeking to capitalize on cross market opportunities in the Asia Pacific region.

name: MESH
des: Mesh Ventures is an investment firm that leverages the engineering, manufacturing, research, and channel resources in Asia to accelerate the growth of disruptive early-stage companies.

name: Mucker Capital
des: Mucker Capital is focused on investments in seed- and pre-stage companies building defensible and scalable businesses in internet software, services, and media.

name: Taiwania Capital
des: Taiwania Capital is a venture capital firm that establishes partnership with worldwide companies and to boost Taiwan's economic growth.

name: WI Harper Group
des: WI Harper Group is a venture capital firm specializing in seed, startup, early growth, mid venture, late venture, and expansion stage investments.

name: Anchor Taiwan
des: Anchor Taiwan is a platform to connect international entrepreneurs, professionals and creatives with the ecosystem in Taiwan.

name: Singularity University
des: Singularity University is a Silicon Valley think tank that offers educational programs and a business incubator. According to its website, it focuses on scientific progress and “exponential” technologies.

name: SVForum
des: We facilitate connections and provide resources and information, covering everything from the latest tech trends to the global startup and investment ecosystem.

name: TAITRA
des: TAITRA assists enterprises to expand their global reach. Headquartered in Taipei, TAITRA has a team of 1,300 specialists and operates 5 local offices in Taoyuan, Hsinchu, Taichung, Tainan and Kaohsiung as well as 63 branches worldwide. Together with Taipei World Trade Center (TWTC) and Taiwan Trade Center (TTC), TAITRA has formed a global network dedicated to promoting world trade.
